channel.title: [4k dloads][PI]Pk Forever Source and Client [25k views]
channel.description:
First of all: The original Source is [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,494813.msg3617550.html#msg3617550]Wilderness Reloaded[/url] by [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=426716]crazyfazespy[/url]
I modified and added/changed a few things.
Changelog: [Code]
Added a staffzone: ::staffzone
Removed the buggy Donator Portal and added the cmd: ::donorzone
added a staffshop in staffzone (you can buy deathcape and other things there) optimized donorzone (banks n stuff...)
look into commands.java for more cmds i've added
added near reality crowns :D [/code]
just search for paul (in source AND client) and replace everything you find with your ingame name.
the ip should be: 127.0.0.1 (search in client.java and gui.java in the client folder)
[img]http://i1115.photobucket.com/albums/k543/dragoon_wuut/advertise1.png[/img]
[img]http://i1115.photobucket.com/albums/k543/dragoon_wuut/advertise2.png[/img]
[img]http://i1115.photobucket.com/albums/k543/dragoon_wuut/advertise3.png[/img] (much more waiting, just a few things i changed ;) )
I hope you have fun with this :)
[u][b]Download:[/b][/u]
Source: [url=http://up.ht/oduHzW]http://up.ht/oduHzW[/url]
Client: [url=http://up.ht/rmSBKJ]http://up.ht/rmSBKJ[/url]
to delete the customs just edit the itemdef.java file ;)
greetings, Paul.
woot, 23k views :D
